Now let me create a comprehensive report based on my findings.

## Research Report: Veterans Service Organization Chapter/Post Data Access

Based on my comprehensive research, here's what I found about accessing local chapter and post data for major Veterans Service Organizations:

---

### 1. VFW (Veterans of Foreign Wars)

**Post Locator URL:**
- [VFW Find a Post: https://www.vfw.org/find-a-post](https://www.vfw.org/find-a-post)
- State departments also maintain regional post roster maps

**Nationwide Scale:**
- **5,500+ posts worldwide** (primary figure cited)
- Approximately **8,000-9,000 posts** in 50 US states, DC, Latin America, Pacific Areas, and Europe
- **957,000 members** (as of recent data; down from 1.4 million in 2024)

**Technical Infrastructure:**
- **No public API** - Post locator is a web interface only
- Uses **Google Maps** integration for mapping functionality
- Frontend: jQuery with client-side filtering
- Analytics: Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics
- Error logging: JSNLog
- **No documented data export/CSV download** capability found

**Data Access Options:**
- Interactive web search by state, distance radius, amenities
- No bulk data export available
- Data appears to be manually maintained by individual posts

**Data Sharing & Partnerships:**
- VFW has active partnership initiatives but limited info on data sharing agreements
- Contact: [VFW Contact Page: https://www.vfw.org/contact-us](https://www.vfw.org/contact-us)
- National HQ: 406 W. 34th Street, Kansas City, Missouri 64111 | (816) 756-3390

**Recommendation for Connector:**
- Web scraping would be required (complex due to JavaScript)
- Recommend contacting VFW National Headquarters directly about data partnership opportunities

---

### 2. American Legion

**Post Locator URL:**
- [Find a Post: https://mylegion.org/PersonifyEbusiness/Find-a-Post](https://mylegion.org/PersonifyEbusiness/Find-a-Post)
- Individual state departments maintain their own post directories

**Nationwide Scale:**
- **12,000+ local posts**
- Multiple states and departments organized hierarchically

**Technical Infrastructure:**
- Uses **Telerik/RadAjax** for server-side asynchronous requests
- jQuery for client-side interactions
- Analytics: Google Tag Manager, Bing UET, Facebook Pixel
- **No public API documented**
- **Server-side implementation** - not exposing public endpoints

**Data Access Options:**
- Web-based search interface by location, state, department
- Membership report system ("Consolidated Post Report" for administrative tracking)
- No public CSV export or API access identified
- Individual state departments may maintain downloadable lists (PDFs)

**Data Sharing & Partnerships:**
- Limited public information on VSO data partnerships
- Notable partnerships: USAA, Wellcare, ID Resolve
- Contact: [National Alliances: https://www.legion.org/alliances](https://www.legion.org/alliances)
- General info: [https://www.legion.org/](https://www.legion.org/)

**Recommendation for Connector:**
- Contact American Legion national headquarters about data access
- Some state departments may have more flexible arrangements
- Web scraping is possible but would need state-by-state implementation

---

### 3. DAV (Disabled American Veterans)

**Chapter Locator URL:**
- [DAV Chapter Locator: https://locators.dav.org/ChapterUnitLocator](https://locators.dav.org/ChapterUnitLocator)
- National Service Office Locator: [https://locators.dav.org/NsoLocator](https://locators.dav.org/NsoLocator)

**Nationwide Scale:**
- **1,900+ local DAV chapters**
- 88 National Service Offices
- 38 Transition Service Offices
- 198 Hospital Service Coordinator Offices
- 52 state-level DAV Departments

**Technical Infrastructure:**
- **Google Maps API** (embedded API key visible in page source)
- jQuery for DOM manipulation
- **Mustache-style templating** for dynamic chapter rendering
- **Interactive geolocation-based search** (zip code + radius)
- Search options: 25, 50, 100, or 200-mile radius

**Data Access Options:**
- No public API endpoint exposed
- Web-based search interface with Google Maps
- Dynamic filtering between DAV chapters and DAV Auxiliary units
- No bulk data export capability found
- **No CSV download** option identified

**Data Sharing & Partnerships:**
- DAV actively seeking partnerships for expanded services
- Recent partnerships: T-Mobile, Dexcom, J&R Schugel Trucking
- Corporate partnership inquiries: [https://www.dav.org/get-involved/corporate-partnership/](https://www.dav.org/get-involved/corporate-partnership/)
- General contact: [https://www.dav.org/find-your-local-office/](https://www.dav.org/find-your-local-office/)

**Recommendation for Connector:**
- Approach DAV through corporate partnership channel
- Leverage their stated mission to "increase partnerships"
- Web scraping possible but may violate terms; direct partnership recommended

---

### 4. AMVETS

**Post Locator URL:**
- [Find a Post: https://www.amvets.org/find-a-post](https://www.amvets.org/find-a-post)
- State department locators (California, Pennsylvania, Washington, etc.)

**Nationwide Scale:**
- **1,400+ posts nationwide**
- **250,000+ members**
- Multiple organizational units (Ladies Auxiliary, Riders Chapters, Sons Squadrons)

**Technical Infrastructure:**
- Web-based post finder interface
- Regional state department post locators
- **No public API** documented
- No specific technical details found about backend

**Data Access Options:**
- Interactive web search by state and location
- State departments maintain their own directories
- No bulk data export capability found

**Data Sharing & Partnerships:**
- Limited public partnership information
- General contact: [https://www.amvets.org/](https://www.amvets.org/)
- "Build a Post" initiative: [https://www.amvets.org/build-a-post](https://www.amvets.org/build-a-post)

**Recommendation for Connector:**
- Direct outreach to AMVETS National HQ
- Contact phone: 877-726-8387
- State departments may be more accessible for partnerships

---

### 5. Vietnam Veterans of America (VVA)

**Chapter Locator URL:**
- [VVA Chapter Locator: https://vva.org/what-we-do/our-members/chapters/](https://vva.org/what-we-do/our-members/chapters/)
- PA State Chapters: [https://www.vva-pa.org/pa-chapters](https://www.vva-pa.org/pa-chapters)

**Nationwide Scale:**
- **700+ chapters**
- **90,000+ members**

**Technical Infrastructure:**
- Web-based chapter search interface
- Zip code search capability
- **No public API** identified

**Data Access Options:**
- Interactive chapter locator by zip code/state
- No bulk export capability found

**Data Sharing & Partnerships:**
- General contact: [https://vva.org/contact/](https://vva.org/contact/)
- Membership info: [https://vva.org/who-we-are/membership/](https://vva.org/who-we-are/membership/)

---

## Summary Table

| Organization | Posts/Chapters | Locator | API? | CSV Export? | Contact Strategy |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| VFW | 5,500-9,000 | [vfw.org/find-a-post](https://www.vfw.org/find-a-post) | No | No | National HQ partnership |
| American Legion | 12,000+ | [mylegion.org](https://mylegion.org/PersonifyEbusiness/Find-a-Post) | No | Limited | State departments + National |
| DAV | 1,900+ | [locators.dav.org](https://locators.dav.org/ChapterUnitLocator) | No | No | Corporate partnership program |
| AMVETS | 1,400+ | [amvets.org/find-a-post](https://www.amvets.org/find-a-post) | No | No | National HQ (877-726-8387) |
| VVA | 700+ | [vva.org/chapters](https://vva.org/what-we-do/our-members/chapters/) | No | No | General contact form |

---

## Key Findings

**Common Patterns:**
1. **No public APIs** - All VSOs use web-only interfaces, not programmatic access
2. **Google Maps integration** - Both VFW and DAV leverage Google Maps for location display
3. **No bulk export** - CSV/JSON downloads not available through any VSO
4. **Manual maintenance** - Posts/chapters maintain their own data
5. **Data freshness** - No public commit dates or freshness indicators

**Recommended Approach for Connector Development:**

1. **Direct Partnership (Preferred)**
   - Contact each VSO's national headquarters about data sharing arrangements
   - Highlight mutual benefits: VSOs get improved resource discoverability
   - DAV's stated goal to "increase partnerships" makes them promising
   - Request quarterly data exports (even as JSON or spreadsheet)

2. **Web Scraping (If Partnership Fails)**
   - VFW and DAV: Need to handle JavaScript rendering (Selenium/Puppeteer)
   - American Legion: Server-side rendering may be simpler
   - Respects robots.txt and rate limiting
   - Would need state-by-state implementation for some orgs

3. **Data Enrichment Path**
   - Use geocoding (Census API) to supplement locations
   - Cross-reference with VA facilities data
   - Calculate trust scores based on update frequency
   - Mark data as "user-contributed" if freshness is unknown

**Next Steps:**
1. Draft partnership outreach to each VSO
2. Request: quarterly data exports, contact info updates, meeting days/hours
3. Propose: "Partner Directory" badge on Vibe4Vets for data providers
4. Fallback: Implement web scraper with 2-week refresh cycle

---

**Sources:**
- [VFW Find a Post](https://www.vfw.org/find-a-post)
- [VFW Contact](https://www.vfw.org/contact-us)
- [American Legion](https://www.legion.org/)
- [American Legion Find a Post](https://mylegion.org/PersonifyEbusiness/Find-a-Post)
- [DAV Chapter Locator](https://locators.dav.org/ChapterUnitLocator)
- [DAV Corporate Partnership](https://www.dav.org/get-involved/corporate-partnership/)
- [AMVETS Find a Post](https://www.amvets.org/find-a-post)
- [VVA Chapter Locator](https://vva.org/what-we-do/our-members/chapters/)
- [VFW Post Statistics - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Veterans_of_Foreign_Wars)
- [American Legion Statistics](https://www.legion.org/about/organization)
- [DAV Statistics - Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disabled_American_Veterans)
- [Congress VSO FAQ](https://www.congress.gov/crs-product/R46412)
- [VA VSO Information](https://www.benefits.va.gov/vso/)
